mapper.select:
select count(b.stcd) ZongZhanShu,count(c.stcd) JiangYuZhanShu,max(c.p) ZuiDaJiangYu,Convert(decimal(18,1),avg(c.p)) PingJunJiangYu from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(p) as p from ST_HP_C where dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))>='${Time_min}' and dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))<='${Time_max}' group by stcd ) as c on b.stcd=c.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}

select sum(case when p>0 and p<10 then 1 else 0 end) as rain1,sum(case when p>=10 and p<25 then 1 else 0 end) as rain2,sum(case when p>=25 and p<50 then 1 else 0 end) as rain3,sum(case when p>=50 and p<100 then 1 else 0 end) as rain4,sum(case when p>=100 and p<250 then 1 else 0 end) as rain5,sum(case when p>=250 then 1 else 0 end) as rain6 from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(p) as p from ST_HP_C where dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))>='${Time_min}' and dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))<='${Time_max}' group by STCD)c1 on b.stcd=c1.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}

select (select ad_nm from WRP_AD_B where ad_cd=substring(addvcd,1,6)+'000000') as xian, (select ad_nm from WRP_AD_B where ad_cd=substring(addvcd,1,9)+'000') as zhen, (select ad_nm from WRP_AD_B where ad_cd=addvcd) as cun, (select FieldName from WRP_FieldInfo where FormID='ST_STBPRP_B' and FieldID='STGR' and Field=b.stgr) as stgr, b.stnm,c.p,b.stcd from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(p) as p from ST_HP_C where dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))>='${Time_min}' and dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))<='${Time_max}' group by stcd ) as c on b.stcd=c.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and b.stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}

select b.STNM,b.STCD from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join ST_Canal_R1 r on r.stcd=b.stcd
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and b.stgr=#{STGR}
and b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'

SELECT convert(varchar(13),dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt)),120) as dt,
max(CASE b.stnm WHEN '${item}' THEN isnull(p,0) ELSE 0 end)${item}雨量,
GETDATE() FROM ST_HP_C h inner join ST_STBPRP_B b on h.stcd=b.STCD where dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))>= '${Time_min}' and dateadd(hh,tm,convert(varchar(10),dt))<= '${Time_max}' GROUP BY dt,tm order by dt

select count(b.stcd) ZongZhanShu,count(c.stcd) JiangYuZhanShu,max(c.p) ZuiDaJiangYu,Convert(decimal(18,1),avg(c.p)) PingJunJiangYu from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join (select stcd,p as p from ST_DP_C where TM='${TM}' ) as c on b.stcd=c.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}

select sum(case when p>0 and p<10 then 1 else 0 end) as rain1,sum(case when p>=10 and p<25 then 1 else 0 end) as rain2,sum(case when p>=25 and p<50 then 1 else 0 end) as rain3,sum(case when p>=50 and p<100 then 1 else 0 end) as rain4,sum(case when p>=100 and p<250 then 1 else 0 end) as rain5,sum(case when p>=250 then 1 else 0 end) as rain6 from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.STCD left join (select stcd,p from ST_DP_C where TM='${TM}' ) as c1 on b.stcd=c1.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}

select sum(case when p>0 and p<800 then 1 else 0 end) as rain1,sum(case when p>=800 and p<1150 then 1 else 0 end) as rain2,sum(case when p>=1150 and p<1400 then 1 else 0 end) as rain3,sum(case when p>=1400 and p<1650 then 1 else 0 end) as rain4,sum(case when p>=1650 and p<2000 then 1 else 0 end) as rain5,sum(case when p>=2000 then 1 else 0 end) as rain6 from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=1 and b.stcd=f.STCD left join (select stcd,p from ST_YRP_F where YR=#{YR}) as c1 on b.stcd=c1.stcd
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
(b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%')
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and stgr = #{STGR}
and p >= #{P}
